column4: how can i get my darn network settings to save, so that i dont have to redo them every time i reboot
hey guys, is there any way i can have an internet connection with WiFi and a wired connection to another machine at the same time???
yes tottally just need to manage your routes
how could i do that
if you use route add you can use card 1 to route to the internet router and then card 2 to route over a lan ip
give us the network ranges and I'll give you the route add ommands
I'm being sporting
i dont understand what that means
give me your network ranges and I'll give you the commands
your ip addresses and gateways
stick ifconfig -a and netstat -rn in a pastebin
is it safe to give out that info (ip and gateway) on the internet???
well, thats your call, but I suspects so as you'll be natted
how do i put it in the pastebin
looking
wifi for int. and wired for VNC on other machine
ok
i have installed guidedog, if that helps
anything interesting?
your networking setup looks spot on
ok, so maybe i just need help with vnc?
anything on the 192 range will go out of the card ath0 and anything else will go out of wifi to the router 192.168.1.1
i just got it to work!!!!!
thats great
